bridge.name: Name of this Bridge
bridge.pincode: Pin code for the bridge MUST FOLLOW the format: 111-11-111

portainer.fqdn: Portainer url including protocol iex.: https://portainer.local
portainer.cleanupInterval: OPTIONAL, default 300secs: Integer for the bridge to remove deleted containers. iex.: 30
portainer.emiterInterval: OPTIONAL, default 60secs  :  for the bridge to check container status iex.: 60

exclude.name: OPTIONAL, Used to filter which containers should be removed from the bridge. Remove the enttire exclude key to disable it
